繁體中文.page_title: 完整量測＋進階 Road Bike Fit
繁體中文.step1: 請一併輸入所有量測數據
繁體中文.expander_help: 量測說明（點此展開/收合）
繁體中文.expander_help_instructions:
- 以下欄位依照原始報告順序列出，請朋友協助逐項量測並填入。
- 若不懂如何量，可點展開看示意說明。
繁體中文.#help_instructions_1_content: 請朋友在牆邊放一本書至會陰處，雙腳並攏，測量書頂到腳跟的距離（cm）。
繁體中文.#help_instructions_2_content: 靠牆站直，請朋友量頸椎第七節 (C7) 到髂骨上緣頂點的垂直距離（cm）。
繁體中文.#help_instructions_3_content: 肘關節自然彎曲成 90°，從肘心到腕關節遠端（手腕）最遠端量距離（cm）。
繁體中文.#help_instructions_4_content: 從肩峰 (Acromion) 到肘關節中心直線距離（cm）。
繁體中文.#help_instructions_5_content: 從髖關節 (大轉子) 到膝關節中心直線距離（cm）。
繁體中文.#help_instructions_6_content: 從膝關節中心到踝關節 (內踝最高點) 直線距離（cm）。
繁體中文.#help_instructions_7_content: 自然站立，請朋友量從地面到胸骨上方凹陷處 (Sternal Notch) 的垂直距離（cm）。
繁體中文.#help_instructions_8_content: 靠牆光腳站直，頭頂觸牆，用捲尺量地面到頭頂的距離（cm）。
繁體中文.#help_instructions_9_content: 放鬆雙肩自然下垂，朋友量左右肩峰 (Acromion) 間的最寬水平距離（cm）。
繁體中文.#help_instructions_10_content: 坐在硬凳或硬板凳上，雙腳打開，標記坐骨最凸出處間水平距離（cm）。
繁體中文.stack_result: ▶ 建議 Stack：{suggested_adv} mm ／ 與車架 Δ = {delta_adv} mm → 可使用墊圈 {spacer_adv} cm。
繁體中文.reach_result: ▶ 建議 Reach：{suggested_adv} mm ／ 與車架 Δ = {delta_adv} mm → 可透過更換龍頭 ±{delta_adv} mm 調整。
繁體中文.shoulder_result: ▶ 建議把手寬度：{value} cm ± 2 cm（常見尺寸：38 / 40 / 42 / 44 cm）
繁體中文.crank_title: 🔧 曲柄長度建議（進階公式）
繁體中文.crank_result: ▶ 曲柄長度：{value_adv} mm（依大腿/小腿分段計算）。
繁體中文.health_tip1: - 若腰部或髖關節僵硬，建議在建議 Stack 上再墊 +0.5 cm，減少腰部受力。
繁體中文.health_tip2: - 若頸椎活動度有限，Reach 建議再短 10 mm 或把龍頭墊高 5 mm。
繁體中文.health_tip3: - 如果胸骨凹口高度與坐骨高度差過大，建議把手 Drop 不超過 60 cm，以免腰背過度伸展。
繁體中文.health_tip4: - 如有身體傷痛或骨盆側傾、膝傷史，請先找物理治療師協助檢測，不要自行大幅調整。

English.page_title: Full Measurements + Advanced Road Bike Fit
English.expander_help_instructions:
- Below fields follow the original report order—please have a friend help measure each item.
- If you’re unsure how to measure, expand to see illustrated instructions.
English.#help_instructions_1_content: Stand legs together against a wall, place a book at crotch, measure from book top to heel (cm).
English.#help_instructions_2_content: Stand against a wall, measure from C7 to top of pelvis (iliac crest) vertically (cm).
English.#help_instructions_3_content: Bend elbow ~90°, measure from elbow center to distal wrist (cm).
English.#help_instructions_4_content: Measure from acromion (shoulder) to elbow center in a straight line (cm).
English.#help_instructions_5_content: Measure from greater trochanter (hip) to knee center in a straight line (cm).
English.#help_instructions_6_content: Measure from knee center to highest point of medial malleolus (ankle) (cm).
English.#help_instructions_7_content: Stand naturally, have friend measure from floor to sternal notch (cm).
English.#help_instructions_8: How to measure Total Body Height?
English.#help_instructions_8_content: Stand barefoot against a wall, measure from floor to top of head (cm).
English.#help_instructions_9_content: Stand relaxed, have friend measure between acromion points (cm).
English.#help_instructions_10: How to measure Sit Bone Width?
English.#help_instructions_10_content: Sit on a hard bench, have friend mark the two sit bone points, measure horizontal distance (cm).
English.stack_result: ▶ Recommended Stack：{suggested_adv} mm ／ Δ = {delta_adv} mm → add spacer {spacer_adv} cm.
English.reach_result: ▶ Recommended Reach：{suggested_adv} mm ／ Δ = {delta_adv} mm → adjust stem by ±{delta_adv} mm.
English.shoulder_result: ▶ Recommended handlebar width：{value} cm ± 2 cm (Common: 38/40/42/44 cm)
English.health_tip1: - If your hip or lower back is stiff, add +0.5 cm to recommended Stack to reduce stress.
English.health_tip2: - If limited neck mobility, reduce Reach by 10 mm or raise stem by 5 mm.
English.health_tip3: - If sternal notch height minus sit bone height is too large, keep handlebar drop under 60 cm to avoid low back strain.
English.health_tip4: - If you have injury history or pelvic tilt, consult a physical therapist before major adjustments.
